feed.subtitle: 游戏开发学习资源分享

entry.title: Search PRO
entry.content:
Search PRO searches for assets, objects, scenes, components, preferences and more, directly in the inspector window, performing searches very fast and customizable.

Introducing Search PRO, the ultimate tool for efficiently finding assets, objects, scenes, components, preferences, and more within the inspector window of your project. With lightning-fast search capabilities and customizable filters, Search PRO makes the inspector window 100% productive, saving you time and effort.

Featuring .NET 3x and 4x compatibility, search sync, and recent modified item tracking, Search PRO ensures that you have access to all the information you need, no matter how many items are in your project. The infinite scroll list and drag-and-drop functionality make it easy to navigate through search results, and the incredible keyboard navigation allows for seamless movement through the list.

Optimize your workflow and increase your productivity with Search PRO's good performance and user-friendly interface. Don't let the inspector window go to waste - make it work for you with Search PRO.

entry.title: Search PRO
entry.content:
Search PRO searches for assets, objects, scenes, components, preferences and more, directly in the inspector window, performing searches very fast and customizable.
Search PRO 直接在檢查器窗口中搜索資產，對象，場景，組件，首選項等，執行搜索非常快速且可自定義。

⭐特點⭐

✔️檢查員100％生產!!!
✔️.NET3x 和4x就緒。
✔️搜索同步
✔️搜索過濾器
✔️最近修改過的物品。
✔️無限滾動列表。
✔️拖放項目。
✔️令人難以置信的導航。
✔️良好的表現。

想像一下，你有一個對你的項目版本至關重要的窗口，但有時它在屏幕上佔據了一個沒用的空間，這就是檢查窗口，現在想像你可以100％高效，這是“搜索PRO”，當沒有選擇任何對象時，它利用了檢查器窗口中的空白區域。

無論您的項目中有多少項目, Search PRO 都會找到它們并快速顯示結果！

屏幕上顯示的對象列表是無限的，僅顯示您需要的信息，您可以通過向上或向下拖動項目來移動滾動列表（就像使用觸摸屏一樣）或向側面拖動對象（例如拖動在場景窗口中搜索三維模型的材料）。

使用鍵盤的導航非常好，只需按下結束/主頁鍵，使用箭頭鍵向下或向上項目，向下按屏幕或使用向下翻頁向上滾動即可輕鬆地從搜索開始到結束或翻頁鍵。

entry.title: Flexalon: UI Layouts
entry.content:
Create responsive UI for your game using two powerful layouts with built-in animations and interactions.

flexalon.com | Documentation | Discord


Flexalon UI Layouts is a drop-in replacement for uGUI Layout Groups, which gives you more control and options in building your UI. The layouts are responsive, adapting to the screen size and to the text and images within the layouts.


  • uGUI Horizontal / Vertical Layout Group -> Flexalon Flexible Layout
  • uGUI Grid Layout Group -> Flexalon Grid Layout

Check out Flexalon Pro: 3D & UI Layouts to get more layouts, including circles, curves, shapes, and more.


Design with Superpowers


In addition to layouts, Flexalon provides powerful built-in Animators and Interactables, enabling you to create a UI with smooth interactions such as reordering lists and drag-and-drop between layouts.


NOT A New UI Framework


Flexalon extends the built-in uGUI framework. Flexalon won’t break your existing workflow, and does not have any dependencies. Flexalon only edits objects that have Flexalon Layout Components attached.


=== FEATURES ===


Flexalon Objects


  • Sizing: Precisely control width, height, and depth of objects.
  • Fill & Shrink: Automatically size objects and layouts to fit the available space.
  • Min / Max: restrict the size for objects and layouts.
  • Margins and padding: Add empty space around objects and inside layouts.

Layouts


  • Flexible Layout: Stack children linearly along the x, y, or z axis, with optional wrapping, alignment, gaps, and shrinking. Think CSS Flexbox in 3D.
  • 3D Grid Layout: Arrange objects in evenly spaced rows, columns, and layers with rectangular or hexagonal cells.
  • Check out Flexalon Pro: 3D & UI Layouts to get more layouts, including circles, curves, shapes, and more.

Animators


  • Curve Animator: Animate objects between layout positions with an adjustable animation curve.
  • Lerp Animator: Animate objects between layout positions using linear interpolation.

Click and Drag


  • Flexalon Interactable: Add click and drag interactions, allowing users to add, remove, and rearrange objects in layouts.

Data Binding


  • Cloner: Automatically generate objects based on a data source
  • Data Binding: Implement an interface to update UI from a data model.

entry.title: Flexalon: UI Layouts
entry.content:
创建响应式用户界面，使用两个强大的布局，内置动画和交互功能。

flexalon.com | 文档 | Discord

Flexalon UI 布局是uGUI布局组的替代品，提供了更多的控制和选项来构建您的用户界面。该布局是响应式的，能够适应屏幕大小以及布局中的文本和图像。

  • uGUI水平/垂直布局组 -> Flexalon灵活布局
  • uGUI网格布局组 -> Flexalon网格布局

查看Flexalon Pro: 3D & UI 布局 以获取更多布局，包括圆形、曲线、形状等。

用超能力设计

除了布局，Flexalon还提供强大的内置动画器 和可交互元素，使您能够创建具有平滑交互的用户界面，例如重新排序列表和在布局之间拖放。

不是一个新的用户界面框架

Flexalon扩展了内置的uGUI框架。Flexalon不会破坏您现有的工作流程，并且没有任何依赖关系。Flexalon仅编辑附加了Flexalon布局组件的对象。

=== 特性 ===


Flexalon 对象

  • 尺寸: 精确控制对象的宽度、高度和深度。
  • 填充与收缩: 自动调整对象和布局的大小以适应可用空间。
  • 最小/最大: 限制对象和布局的大小。
  • 边距和填充: 在对象周围和布局内部添加空白空间。

布局

  • 灵活布局: 沿 x、y 或 z 轴线性堆叠子元素，支持可选的换行、对齐、间隙和收缩。想象一下 3D 中的 CSS Flexbox。
  • 3D 网格布局: 将对象排列成均匀间隔的行、列和层，使用矩形或六边形单元格。
  • 查看 Flexalon Pro: 3D & UI 布局 以获取更多布局，包括圆形、曲线、形状等。

动画器

  • 曲线动画器: 使用可调节的动画曲线在布局位置之间为对象添加动画效果。
  • Lerp 动画器: 使用线性插值在布局位置之间为对象添加动画效果。

点击和拖动

  • Flexalon 可交互: 添加点击和拖动交互，允许用户在布局中添加、移除和重新排列对象。

数据绑定

  • 克隆器: 基于数据源自动生成对象
  • 数据绑定: 实现接口以从数据模型更新用户界面。

entry.title: UI Node Connect 4
entry.content:
UI Node Connect 4 is a customizable runtime UGUI Node Graph Framework that facilitates the creation of interactive node graph interfaces inside your Game or App.

The UI Node Connect 4 is a runtime UGUI Node Graph Framework with Nodes, Ports and Connections, drag and drop, a custom UI line renderer and useful features to create node graphs, flowcharts, circuit boards, connection puzzles, among other creative ways for the users to interact with your game or app.


📚 Documentation

📚 Code Reference

🎮 Logic Gates Sample Scene


Customize the asset with your own sprites, texts, colors, buttons and expand it by adding new features using the API to hook up to events and analyze the Nodes, Ports and Connections.

Make the Canvas part of your gameplay by adding a new interaction way for the users to manipulate and connect Nodes to each other.

entry.title: UI Node Connect 4
entry.content:
UI Node Connect 4 是一个可定制的运行时 UGUI 节点图框架，便于在您的游戏或应用程序中创建交互式节点图界面。

UI Node Connect 4 是一个 运行时 UGUI 节点图框架，具有节点、端口和连接、拖放功能、自定义 UI 线渲染器以及创建节点图、流程图、电路板、连接谜题等多种创意方式的实用功能，供用户与您的游戏或应用程序进行交互。

📚 文档

📚 代码参考

🎮 逻辑门示例场景

使用您自己的精灵、文本、颜色、按钮自定义资产，并通过使用 API 添加新功能来扩展它，以 连接到事件 并分析 节点、端口和连接。

通过为用户添加新的交互方式，使画布成为您游戏玩法的一部分，以便操纵和连接节点。
